name: Deeg Deeper!
description:
Dig deeper to find coins and treasure. The deeper you go, the darker will be. Try to avoid stepping on animals as it might kill you!

Movement with arrow keys or WASD.

This is a submission to Ludum Dare 48, made by ZJ, ZJ's lil bro, and me.

The game is not really finished yet, it does not have all the mechanics that we want. But it is playable.

Basically we wanted to try to do pixel art, which in the end we used most of existing assets..haha

Most assets are from: https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

Background music from: https://freesound.org/people/VABsounds/sounds/391626/
